name: VR Maze Run Journey for Cardboard glasses
name_original: VR Maze Run Journey for Cardboard glasses
description:
Escape from 3d adventure maze. Survive by finding exit door in a maze. There are 18 levels to complete. You have to explore and find a way out of the labyrinth without any maps.

To control your movement you have to rotate your head with VR headset on your head. If you get tired, you can look down for 3 seconds and you will exit a level.

Note: This app requires a VR headset (Google Cardboard, Durovis Dive, Dodocase VR, VRelia GO, Homido, Gear VR) for best results.

If you like our game, please give it a rate and a review.
